item.title: exa
item.description: exa is neat as it shows pretty colors, optional [[git]] status, and icons. It’s part of the [[notes/tools/Modern Unix]] stack, supplementing the venerable ls.

item.title: zsh
item.description: A neat shell, on both [[notes/OS/macOS]] and [[notes/OS/Ubuntu]]. As far as I remember not quite [[POSIX]]-compliant like [[bash]] and therefore(?) not as portable, but a lot nicer.
